steven.name: Steven Tessier
about: Steven Tessier is the founder and director of the Whygo Language Center in Taipei.
He is a veteran teacher with over 30 years of experience.

experience: Steven Tessier is a veteran teacher with over 30 years of experience.
He has taught thousands of students and consistently reaches high scores with them.
He created hundreds of IELTS and grammar teaching handouts.
He is the founder and director of the Whygo Language Center in Taipei.
He also speaks and teaches French (perfectly bilingual).
His clients include executives and managers of large international companies in Taiwan such as Intel and Deloitte.
He regularly taught courses and lectures at Taiwanese Universities.
He worked with the Taiwanese government to design and deliver courses on protocol, etiquette and cultural differences to train Taiwanese diplomats.
license: IELTS writing (including how to finish on time)
IELTS reading (some students improved by 1 band after only 6 classes)

shad.name: Shad Gilbert
about: Shad is a Senior teacher with over 20 years of teaching experience in the US, China and Taiwan.
He is also the head teacher at the Whygo Language Center in Taipei.

experience: His clients include executives and managers of large international companies in Taiwan such as Ernst and Young, CPC, Dimension Data, etc.
Shad has helped Doctors and other professionals revise articles for publication in prestigious journals and prepare them to make important presentations in front of large audiences.
He has extensive experience in public speaking, often to groups nearing a thousand.
license: IELTS writing (sentence structures and avoiding Chinglish)
Shad speaks and writes Chinese (perfectly bilingual)
He develops customized training programs and evaluation methods for corporations, publishers and educational institutions. He also trains other foreign teachers.
Shad has taught many aspects of English, including business English, grammar and vocabulary, academic writing and is an expert at test preparation such as IELTS, TOEFL, SAT, GRE and GMAT.

Shad also has a wide range of complementary skills and experiences: he has studied Chinese, Spanish, Ancient Greek and Ancient Hebrew; he was part of a team that launched a new organization; he has trained and led volunteers to work in Africa, South America and Europe; he also has experience in retail, health care, food service and hospitality.

kate.name: Kate Licup
education: Bachelor of Science in Mining Engineering.
license: TESOL certificate in teaching English to children.
Trained business students in presentations, meetings, and communicating in English.

appointement: After purchasing the course, you can reserve the course according to the time on the teacher's calendar.
If the teacher shows "available to teach immediately", you can immediately reserve the teacher's time for the meeting.
If the teacher is not online, you can make a reservation for a class as soon as 48 hours later.
faq.fee: The course duration is 30 minutes per unit
intructions: Enter the website 10 minutes before the class starts, select "My Courses" to find the class and click "Enter Classroom" to open the ZOOM classroom and start class.
ZOOM classes can be used on mobile phones and computers (please download the ZOOM app on mobile phones first).
faq.question: Contact us as soon as possible if there is a problem with the course.
